Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: People on social media are calling on the Albanese Government to prioritize economic inclusion in the upcoming budget. They strongly advocate for increases to social security payments citing their inadequacy to cover basic necessities such as food housing and healthcare. They appreciate the government's past commitments to improve childcare parental leave and women's safety while urging them to act in the latest budget to ensure nobody is left behind. They express hope for responsible decision-making based on recommendations given by the Economic-Inclusion Advisory Committee. Finally they express gratitude to organizations such as the IMPACT Auditors General Conference that ensure taxpayer money is well spent.
